description: Kinjou is a low-ranked member of the LXE, assigned to spy on Papillon and, if possible, finish off the Alchemy Warriors of Ginsei High. He is loud, arrogant, and uses the catch phrase "Hyahou" frequently. He has the ability to talk without his tongue. Kinjou is defeated by Captain Bravo, then killed by his teammate, Jinnai. Watsuki based Kinjo on Inui Banjin from Rurouni Kenshin.
name: Kinjou
